name: Sakura (Let's Talk Game Design)
description:
A very quick entry into the GMTK Jam 2021, for the theme Joined Together. 

WASD/Arrow Keys to move. The rest, I think, is self-explanatory.

Graphics and SFX made by me, music sourced below:

MUSIC ATTRIBUTION:
